description.value: You control your spirit energy when you attack, using it to reinforce yourself or to thrust past your enemy's physical defenses. Make a fist Strike; on a success, you can choose to either deal all damage from the attack as spirit damage, or deal damage as normal but gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level that last for 1 round.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
